section.name: Project Status
section.p: log4net is an effort undergoing incubation at the Apache Software Foundation (ASF), sponsored by the Apache Logging Services project. Incubation is required of all newly accepted projects until a further review indicates that the infrastructure, communications, and decision making process have stabilized in a manner consistent with other successful ASF projects. While incubation status is not necessarily a reflection of the completeness or stability of the code, it does indicate that the project has yet to be fully endorsed by the ASF.
As log4net is undergoing incubation these releases are not officially endorsed by the ASF.
